column2: image=[[File:The Hobbit - The Battle of the Five Armies - Ragash.jpg
caption="Ragash" from ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]''
Orc]] scout who was part of [[Azog]]'s army in ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]''. He was played by Alan Smith and voiced by Martin Kwok.

column1: As the Orc army is making its way to the [[Lonely Mountain]] through the tunnels burrowed by the [[Were-worms]], Ragash alerts Azog that the army will be ready to attack the Mountain by dawn. It is unknown if Ragash survived the [[Battle of Five Armies]].<ref>''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]''</ref>
